post.title: is this normal?
post.content: had my vt20 for about 2 weeks now. while i absolutely love the tv, there are just a few things that annoy me. first it has turned its self on and off a few times, there is a very loud buzzing, and there seems to be a black bar down the right side of the screen. ( for some reason i cant upload any photos at the moment). what shall i do?
